author: David Kanner
text: I am looking for examples of employment agreement language in which the employer agrees to purchase the manager's home in the city the manager is moving from.  None of the options in sections 15 and 16 of the ICMA model employment agreement directly address what I'm looking for.  I'm looking for contract language under which my current employer would simply purchase my home in my former jurisdiction.  Anyone have anything?
title: Home purchase agreements
